title: !^ NEW VOID CHAMP IDEA ^!
body:
Okay so, i was thinking about how the void is all portals and dimensions and what not, then i realised, there is no champ with moves that revolve around using those void portals. Apart from Bard or maybe {{champion:90}}'s ult kinda looks like one, but none can kinda manipulate the positioning of and enemy or maybe even allied champ.

Nayl'o- The void keeper

Passive: Havent thought of one sadly :(

Q: Void Cross
Nayl'o Sends out a ranged attack like a Vel'koz w but two of them and without the second part. These two Void lines cross over each other depending on where you aim it, like a heimer q. It would do 80/100/130/170/210+(70% of AP)

This one is nice

W: Void Portal
Nayl'o Inflicts a enemy champ or allied champ with A void portal
Enemy: after two seconds the void portal above the head will implode dragging surrounding enemies towards them and dealing 40/50/60/80/100 Magic damage to all affected ( like an Oriana Ult).

If the Ability is reactivated the Enemy can be teleported up to 400 units away from their current position, no damage is dealt though a small slow maybe.

Ally: The same thing happens except no damage is dealt to the ally. And it can also be reactivated.

E: Punishing slap thing
Two void creatures appear from the ground through a portal next to each other.They act like a sort of meat grinder and push the enemy through the gap Dealing 50/70/100/120/160
(im not sure if this makes sense, but i know how it works in my head so it can be reworded im just horrible at explaining XD)

Ult:No ult

I know there are some important components missing but they can be fixed once the right person gets to it, this is just an idea and i hope it sparks something in the brain of some champion designer out there Haha.
Please ask questions if you have one.

replies.body: Love the name of the E :^ )
